remarks: Lemma for ~ pgpfac .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)
statement:
pgpfac.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
pgpfac.c $e |- C = { r e. ( SubGrp ` G ) | ( G |`s r ) e. ( CycGrp i^i ran pGrp ) } $.
pgpfac.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
pgpfac.p $e |- ( ph -> P pGrp G ) $.
pgpfac.f $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
pgpfac.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
pgpfac.a $e |- ( ph -> A. t e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ( t C. U -> E. s e. Word C ( G dom DProd s /\ ( G DProd s ) = t ) ) ) $.
pgpfaclem3 $p |- ( ph -> E. s e. Word C ( G dom DProd s /\ ( G DProd s ) = U ) ) $.
$d B s t $.
$d C s t $.
$d G r s t $.
$d U r s t $.
$d ph t $.
